doc.firstappearance: (Mentioned) Official Handbook of the Marvel Universe #5 (1983); (seen) Hulk vs. Hercules: When Titans Collide #1 (2008)
doc.knownrelatives: Rhea (wife), Poseidon, Pluto/Hades, Zeus (sons), Demeter, Hera]], Vesta/Hestia (daughters), Uranus/Ouranos (father, deceased), Gaea (mother), Coeus, Crius, Hyperion, Lapetus, Oceanus (brothers), Mnemosyne, Phoebe, Tethys, Theia, Themis (sisters), numerous others
doc.powers: Cronus possesses superhuman strength (lifting 100 tons), durability, plus undefined energy casting powers.
